banner_section.description: Want to feel the freshness of your boat or yacht? No need to buy a new vessel  our craftsmen will make yours even better, special for you. Experience a new level of comfort, reliability, and style with Fler&Co

catalog.title: Our Products
catalog.all_products_title: Boat seats, patterns, colors, design solutions

product.description: Perfect combination of ergonomics and functionality. Comfortable anatomical shape provides back support even during long periods on water. Suitable for all types of boats  from compact flat-bottomed to spacious cabin models.

history.title: Origin story
history.description: The Fler&Co workshop began as a small creative team passionate about restoring and reupholstering soft furniture. Over time, we expanded our expertise to include sewing covers for furniture and car seats, as well as making cushions and captain's chairs. In 2009-2010, we made our first boat seats for Finval  a collaboration that set a high standard. Later on, we developed and implemented high-precision laser equipment that uses digital blueprints, which in 2023 allowed us to move from single orders to stable serial production.

step1.title: 1. Creating the base
step1.description: Production begins with a metal mold, into which polypropylene  a strong and reliable long-lasting material  is injected under high pressure.

step2.title: 2. Design and 3D modeling
step2.description: Our designers create chairs using modern three-dimensional modeling, ensuring perfect ergonomics, precise fit, and a style agreed upon with the client.

step3.title: 3. Comfort and finishing
step3.description: The finished frame goes to the workshop, where we form the seating part from polyurethane foam, cut upholstery segments on CNC equipment, and assemble according to the approved design.

step4.title: 4. Final inspection
step4.description: Each product is tested for geometry, strength, and finishing quality before delivery to the client.

why_choose_us.title: Why choose us
why_choose_us.description: We are trusted and recommended by Finval, Alba Boat, Powerboat, FurSeal, AquaSpirit, UMS, GELEX, AluMagic, Whaly, and other manufacturers. Marine seats from our production are regularly presented at leading yacht and shipbuilding exhibitions in Ukraine and Europe, earning high praise from both professionals and private owners. Our clients value flawless quality, thoughtful ergonomics, and proven product durability. We aim for every seat to be not just a vessels detail  but a blend of comfort, style and safety that reflects both the vessels character and the owners individuality.

individual_projects.title: Custom projects
individual_projects.description: We go far beyond a catalogue of standard models. Leading boat and yacht manufacturers trust our workshop for custom seat designs, tailored to their specific requirements. Together with our designers, each client defines the shape, color, materials, decorative elements, and seating parameters. This approach lets us bring any idea to life  from subtle stylistic details to complex engineering solutions. Whether the client needs an eye-catching accent for a showpiece vessel or a special model for the specifics of a vessel, we will craft a seat that delivers comfort, safety, and prestige.
individual_projects.examples: Examples of custom marine seat designs

faq.title: Your questions
faq.not_found: Didn't find what you were looking for?

q1.title: Do you offer a personalized approach to ordering marine seats?
q1.body: Yes, we apply an exclusive approach to every order. Our craftsmen take all your preferences into account: we can adapt any available seat design to suit your ideas and expectations or create a unique model specifically for you. Contact us for a detailed customization consultation  we will be happy to help.

q2.title: What delivery methods do you offer?
q2.body: We deliver across Ukraine and Europe using the 'Nova Poshta' postal service and its branches. Delivery time takes from 1 to 3 days within Ukraine and from 3 to 7 days across Europe (delays are possible). The delivery cost is paid by the recipient. Pickup directly from our workshop is also available. By agreement, we can ship via other postal services as well.

q3.title: What materials are used in the production of your marine seats?
q3.body: We use reliable and durable materials for our seats: frames are made of HDPE (high-density polyethylene); cushions, seat pads and bolsters are made of polyurethane foam (or sheet foam in larger models); upholstery is made of UV-resistant marine vinyl; brackets and folding mechanisms are made of stainless steel.

q4.title: How to keep marine seats in good condition?
q4.body: Clean them regularly with a mild soap solution and fresh water. Use protective covers against sunlight, and check the seats for wear. Folding mechanisms and brackets are recommended to be lubricated up to 3 times per season. White lithium grease or silicone spray is suitable  apply to metal parts and avoid contact with fabric and plastic.

q5.title: How does the return process work if the order arrives faulty?
q5.body: Since 2023, the Fler&Co workshop has been producing marine seats and accessories in serial production while maintaining a high quality standard. Companies such as Finval, Alba Boat, Powerboat, and others trust us. We stand behind each product we make. If you discover a manufacturing defect, contact us  we will promptly replace it with a new one or refund the full amount.

q6.title: How long does it take to manufacture an order?
q6.body: The production time of an order is up to 7 days from the moment it is accepted. The duration depends on the complexity and volume of the order  larger projects take more time. We will agree on the exact timeframe with you during our communication. If you have special requests or need to meet a specific date  let us know, and we will find a suitable solution.

q7.title: Custom offers for large orders and long-term partnerships
q7.body: Are you a boat dealer looking for favorable wholesale terms? Or do you represent a company that needs a marine seat manufacturer for long-term cooperation? We would be glad to meet you, discuss your needs, and find a convenient and beneficial solution for you. Contact us  together we will choose a format that suits the volume and timing.
